channel.title: Need some help with fixing this glitchy problem
channel.description:
Hey guys,
I've seen someone do it before and he did it in like 1 minute, but how do you change it so monsters wont die like this:
[img]http://i51.tinypic.com/m2dko.png[/img]
But like withouth all the glitchy stuff, I have a 316 with 597 monsters I beleave. But if you can just tell me how this glitch is called I can probably find a tutorial somewhere on the web, or you can explain to me how to do it that'd be great too!
Thanks allready.

item.title: Need some help with fixing this glitchy problem
item.dc:creator: @UniqueTrys UniqueTrys
item.description:
@UniqueTrys wrote:

Yeah, I’m pretty sure it’s in the Source and I know it has to do something with animations, however I really have no idea where to go. Been in NPCHandler.java but can’t quite find it, if anyone has any type of a tip that might help please message below!

Read full topic
item.source: Need some help with fixing this glitchy problem
